edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.parameters

Class ParameterXMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.parameters.ParameterXMLParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParameterXMLWriter

    public class ParameterXMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for processing analysis parameters from suitably formatted XML files.
    Author:
    cfuller

        public ParameterXMLParser()

    • Method Detail

      • parseKnownParametersToParameterList

        public java.util.List<Parameter> parseKnownParametersToParameterList()
        Parses the list of some of the known Parameters from an XML file to a List of Parameters; useful for allowing users to interacitively select from known parameters.
        Returns:
        A List containing a Parameter object for each Parameter described in the known parameters file.

      • parseXMLFileToParameterDictionary

        public ParameterDictionary parseXMLFileToParameterDictionary(java.lang.String filename)
        Parses an XML file to a ParameterDictionary.
        Parameters:
        filename - The XML file to parse.
        Returns:
        A ParameterDictionary with an entry for each parameter described in the XML file.

      • convertParameterListToParameterDictionary

        public ParameterDictionary convertParameterListToParameterDictionary(java.util.List<Parameter> pl)
        Collects a List of Parameters (as might be generated by parseXMLFileToParameterList(String)) into a ParameterDictionary.
        Parameters:
        pl - The List of Parameters to consolidate.
        Returns:
        A ParameterDictionary containing an entry for each supplied Parameter.

      • parseXMLFileToParameterList

        public java.util.List<Parameter> parseXMLFileToParameterList(java.lang.String filename)
        Parses an XML file to a list of Parameters, suitable for direct use or for conversion to a ParameterDictionary.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the XML file describing the parameters.
        Returns:
        A List containing one Parameter object for each parameter described by the XML file.

      • parameterWithXMLNode

        public Parameter parameterWithXMLNode(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Parses an XML node from an XML parameter file to a Parameter object.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to parse.
        Returns:
        The Parameter described by the supplied node.
